metadata.name: Kirō and the Alley
metadata.description:
Chapter I.

Kirō's story begins here. This little furry friend will be part of my story now, inspired by the birth of my son in March 2020 we will see many adventures with this character.

Kirō is very curious...

---------------------
Tools:
- 3dsMAx
- Moi3d
- Zbrush
- Hair with Ornatrix
- Water and Smoke sim with PhoenixFD
- After Effects

--------------
Music Background written by Bryan Teoh. 
Sound Fx anx Mix by Ricardo Motta
